START.text: You don't look like you're from around here.

answers.text: I've lived here all my life!

P1.text: Oh really? Then you must know Mr. Bowler.

answers.text: Mr. Bowler is a good friend of mine!

P2.text: Newton, eh? I heard there's trouble brewing down there.

answers.text: I haven't heard about any trouble.
Did I say Newton? I'm actually from Springville

P3.text: You liar! There ain't no Mr. Bowler, I made him up!

P4.text: Don't you worry about it. Say do you have something to eat? I'm starving
